page.title: 04VILLAGE LIFE
page.content: corner,and a place to paint and glue. Politics-There is an annexe to Roslin School at Bilston for P1 and 2. The council wanted to close it down to save money but a parent's campaign saved it. Events - each summer 9 local primary schools compete in the inter-school sports. Each school chooses a team to represent them in various track events. This year the event was renamed the Penicuik and District Athletics Festival. The venue was the new Beeslack High School. New events were introduced such as the triathlon, long jump, a tug of war and a long race! Mediaeval fayre Roslin,Held in grounds of the chapel every June the fayre is comprised of games dancing plays and craft stalls.Pig and Beef are spit roasted.Mediaeval costumes are worn
